title: 03 bedroom apartment for sale in Wellawatte
location: W. A. De Silva Mawatte , Colombo 6
details:
Perfectly priced, fully furnished apartment for sale in the heart of Wellawatte, surrounded in a commercial & residential area.
Banks, schools, hospitals, eateries & public transportation all located within close proximity.

Consists of :-

- 03 bedrooms
- 02 bathrooms
- 1100 sqft
- 24 hours security
- Secured parking

Ideal for single families.

Further inquiries please contact Linea Property.
